Class Version

extends java.lang.Object
    LAME header version information.
    See Also:
    LAMEHeader, LAME version string, LAME Header Format

      • getFlag

        public char getFlag()
        gets the release type for the version.
        Returns:
        the LAME version flag, where:
        a alpha
        b beta
        r release with patch version > 0
         release with no patch version
